answers.answer: My doctor is the same way I've only had two my whole pregnancy and I'm due next month ! They have a lot of other tests they do while your pregnant to make sure baby is healthy and if something looks abnormal they usually give you another one . but I felt the same way very nervous like what if something is wrong and they can't see it only with ultra sound ! ..

that's exactly how I feel! I had a miscarriage last year so just hearing a heartbeat isn't exactly comforting to me! I don't want to find out something is wrong at birth just because I only had two ultrasounds!
That's how I'm feeling right now cause I'm due next month and I'm nervous ! I understand were your coming from .

thats how my doctors office is as well. i think its bull s h i t. i want at least one closer to the end so i can see how much shell weigh and how shes grown. i think its ridiculous that we dont get more then two. i dont understand at all.
In the UK everyone only has 2 scans on the nhs unless the baby is really unwell so I know how you feel :( wish I could see baby more but I'm glax me and the baby are fine at the same time

I also only received 2 ultrasounds, my doctor said since I was low risk I didn't need any. Ultrasounds are not really necessary, your symptoms are far more important. Sometimes ultrasounds give false indications and cause us undo worry. I know you are disappointed but please continue to go to the doctor, she will be able to answer your questions and make sure you and baby are healthy!
I'd also like to add that ultrasounds are really bad at predicting weight. They can be up to 3 lbs off! Crazy, huh?

I specifically go to my Dr because he does ultrasounds every appt. I think it's important, especially when it's your first. That being said, it's really based on your Dr and insurance. Mine covers everything, but if yours doesn't then they won't unless necessary. :(
I scheduled one myself at the hospital that I'm delivering with out telling my doctor , && I'll be scheduling a 3d/4d myself also since my doctor has only giving me one altrasound ,

Well you need to go to your appointments still. They are important. Especially when they get to the stage where they measure you and check your urine for protein to make sure you don't have preeclampsia. Also monitoring your weight is important and your doctor does this as well. Women went a long time without even having ultrasounds, my grandma had five babies and never got one ultrasound. Plus they are expensive and usually your insurance will only cover a certain amount of them.
If you want more ultrasound appointments find a clinic that does them but you have to pay out of pocket. That's what I did and I got two extra ultrasounds.

Well just fake theat you been having a lot of pain or that you habent reay felt baby and theu will do you one I had 4 done and at my doctor and one I paid for judt like a month agao I had my last one but since im due in a month too they afe gonna check me on tuesday so im not so worrued and my baby is doing very well but I get you when I had a miscariage last year I was very devestated

Some doctors offices just do that. They only do the required ultrasounds that they can bill your insurance for. Any other ultrasound is complimentary, so some doctors offices won't do them. I would call different d

I would call different doctors that accept your insurance and ask how often they do ultrasounds. Having ultrasounds done at every appointment was very important to me as well so I made sure that was something I would receive before I switched doctors.
Yea i have a private dr and i have an u/s every appointment

My doctor gives me an ultrasound everytime i go for an appt so far ive gotten more then 5 ultrasounds already, so i am pretty lucky i guess:) but ill be feeling you like you if i only had 2 ultrasounds my whole pregnancy i had a missed miscarrage back in feb of 2014 so i am glad my doctor gives me an ultrasound everytime i go it puts my mind at ease. Try looking for a different OB
I'm in the same boat and I'm due next month. I went through the same thing where I told them why don't they give more than 2. But I'm always at ease when I feel my daughters kicks and moves.
I only get one ultra sound to find out the gender and they gave be free Pics with that one.If i want another i have to pay out of pocket

I've already had two, and I'm getting another one at my next appointment, and another after that. My doctor is good with letting me see the baby which makes me happy. It's the only reason I look forward to going to the appointments.

I only get two too. And it ***** because I had to be rushed to the emergency room due to server bleeding, and they used my ultrasounds during my stay. And now I have to pay just to find out the gender of my baby.

question: my doctor told me that she's only going togive me two uultrasounds during the whole pregnancy. I've already had one of the two, and the other is in October to find out the gender. I think this is ridiculous because I imagined being able to actually see my baby grow every appointment. not only seeing it twice in 9 months! am I overreacting? I just pictured my pregnancy alot differently. I don't see the point of going in every appointment to just discuss the pregnancy, I can do that with family in my opinion. it just seems like a waste of.time to me
title: ultrasound
